name: Epic Anime Move!!
text: You can only activate this card if you type in the public chat "I’m feeling the flow! Time to get my game on!". Type in chat what you think your top card is going to be, shuffle the deck, and draw 1 card, then reveal it; if you called it right, type "Draw [enter correct card type] cardo!", and Special Summon as many "Dark Magician", "Blue-Eyes White Dragon", "Elemental Hero Neos", "Stardust Dragon", "Number 39: Utopia", "Odd-Eyes Dragon", "Decode Talker", “Slifer the Sky Dragon”, “Obelisk the Tormentor", and "The Winged Dragon of Ra" as possible, ignoring summoning conditions. If "Number 39: Utopia" is Summoned, you can attach cards from your GY as XYZ material, up to 2. You can only use "Epic Anime Move!!" once per duel.
